definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
Commonwealth of Independent States (former Soviet Union)
pinyin: Du2 li4 guo2 jia1 lian2 he2 ti3

sentences.english: Since 2003, the Tourism-based Country Strategy has been established and implemented in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 自2003年以来，日本确立并实施了观光立国战略。

sentences.english: One US official at the time called this the "stupidest thing this country ever did".
sentences.chinese: 当时一名美国官员称此举“立国以来，蠢无前例”。

sentences.english: Select colors that match or go with neutrals that fit and style .
sentences.chinese: 选择匹配的颜色，或到与中立国适合和作风。

sentences.english: The Vatican was compelled, to establish an independent country, within the boundary of Italy.
sentences.chinese: 教廷被迫在梵蒂冈成为意大利境内的一个独立国家。

sentences.english: They thrust a neutral state into war.
sentences.chinese: 他们强把中立国推入战争。

sentences.english: Italy isn't the only European country that has tiny 13)independent states within its 14)borders.
sentences.chinese: 义大利并非唯一在境内有迷你独立国的欧洲国家。

sentences.english: The soldier was interned in a neutral country until the war was over.
sentences.chinese: 这些士兵被扣留在中立国直到战争结束。

sentences.english: The people are the foundation of our Party and country.
sentences.chinese: 人民是我们的立党立国之本。

sentences.english: Iraq's future as an independent nation hangs heavily on the unity of its military.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克作为一个独立国家的未来倚重军队的团结。

sentences.english: These are the clans of Noah's sons, according to their lines of descent, within their nations.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是挪亚三个儿子的宗族，各随他们的支派立国。

sentences.english: Then said Samuel to the people, Come, and let us go to Gilgal, and renew the kingdom there.
sentences.chinese: 撒母耳对百姓说，我们要往吉甲去，在那里立国。

sentences.english: Switzerland is a neutral country in the two world wars.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士在两次世界大战中都是中立国家。

sentences.english: American preference for sea power and its pursuit of balance of power in its for Eign policy derive from its geopolitical environment.
sentences.chinese: 海权立国与均势外交根源于美国的地缘特征。

sentences.english: Belgium"s neutrality was violated in 1914, when Germany invaded Belgium as part of the Schlieffen Plan.
sentences.chinese: 1914年，德国入侵比利时，侵犯了其中立国地位。

sentences.english: The education is the first and last word in building up a country.
sentences.chinese: 教育是立国之本，关乎国运兴衰。

sentences.english: The theme of his creation paid more attention to his own daily life.
sentences.chinese: 张立国的创作主题开始更多的关注其自身的日常生活。

definition: to found a state/to open a closed country
to found a country/nation-building/the foundation of PRC by Mao Zedong in 1949
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
Han Chinese name for an ancient Central Asia country
to go on or send a punitive expedition
Han Dynasty term for the Roman Empire 羅馬帝國|罗马帝国[Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2]
Great Ancestor (posthumous title, e.g. for the founder of a dynasty)
(of a nation) to be destroyed/subjugation/vanquished nation
